author: Google
description:
Set the perfect vibe for your Halloween party! This 12-hour video features PAC-MAN with a haunted twist: trick-or-treating in his neighborhood while evading his team of ghosts. We’ve paired the endless maze with a dark, eerie ambient soundscape to create the ultimate ghostly atmosphere.

Let the original arcade ghosts—Blinky, Pinky, Inky, and Clyde—add a retro ghoulish  feel to your night. It's the perfect background visual and soundtrack for your party. No need to manage a playlist; just press play and let this 12-hour loop provide a creepy, nostalgic mood for all your ghouls and guests.

Dare to play our exclusive game? Find PAC-MAN here: http://goo.gle/3JA22GO

What's your favorite retro game? Let us know in the comments!

#GoogleDoodle #AmbientMusic #PACMAN #RetroGaming

Subscribe to our Channel: https://www.youtube.com/google
Find us on X: https://twitter.com/google
Watch us on TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@google
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/google
Join us on
title: 12 Hours of Retro Gaming for Halloween Vibes (PAC-MAN Edition)

author: Google
description:
We’re bringing PAC-MAN back with a Halloween twist. Play our latest take on this retro game with eight levels full of ghostly tricks and secret fan treats.

title: PAC-MAN’s Back on Google Doodle

author: Google
description:
Here’s the prompt we used with #NanoBanana (now available in Search) to transform a selfie into an arcade avatar ⬇️

“vibrant, full-body arcade game sprite portrait, black outline, dynamic neon-lit fighting stage background”

Then, we used #Veo3 to bring it life!
title: Pixelate yourself in seconds with Nano Banana and Veo 👾
